_exampleRaider.weight: True Weight System, So you can tweak which skins you want to see more.
_exampleRaider.enabled: After you get your Twitch list, you may have broken skins because ppl have changed names. So you can disable them here.
_exampleRaider.customSkin: Give resourcelocation of custom skin. Use raiders build in resource loading, by adding an image into assets/skins/filename.png Than set custom skin to raiders:skins/filename. You may also use any other resourceloader.
_exampleRaider._comment: Comment section is for you leave a comment if you disabled something to know why. or just any comment you want.
